pullrequest.title: [WIP] Run test against multiple physics plugins

content.raw:
This line is still a problem with the `ignition::physics::dartsim::Plugin` name hard-coded. I would love to use `Loader::PluginsImplementing`, but that only takes a single template parameter, but these physics plugins have a bunch of interfaces stuck together in a tuple.

We could load all plugins in each library file and call `RequestEngine` on each one to see if it has the features we need I suppose. That's probably easier in the short-term than extending the `ignition::plugin::Loader::PluginsImplementing` to handle variadic template parameters.
content.html:
This line is still a problem with the ignition::physics::dartsim::Plugin name hard-coded. I would love to use Loader::PluginsImplementing, but that only takes a single template parameter, but these physics plugins have a bunch of interfaces stuck together in a tuple.

We could load all plugins in each library file and call RequestEngine on each one to see if it has the features we need I suppose. That's probably easier in the short-term than extending the ignition::plugin::Loader::PluginsImplementing to handle variadic template parameters.
